name: Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball
name_original: Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball
description:
Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball is a simulation, sports and card game developed by Team NINJA. It came out on 22-01-2003. Tecmo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball on Xbox.
Mitsuo Osada and Tomonobu Itagaki produced the game.
